text: RNA was isolated from the cells , reverse-transcribed , and then subjected to quantitative PCR to determine levels of <extra_id_0> GLepsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts .
Results were normalized to the levels of <extra_id_0> Hprt1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts in each sample .
Symbols indicate the values from duplicate cultures ( a line indicates the mean of the two values ) .
Similar results were obtained in a second experiment and in an additional experiment with a second <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient clone .
